mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from mymemoryalbum order by memory_num desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from mymemoryalbum order by memory_num desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum} and memory_id = #{id}
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from mymemoryalbum order by memory_num desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum} and memory_category = 'health'
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from mymemoryalbum order by memory_num desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum} and memory_category = 'art'
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from mymemoryalbum order by memory_rec desc) tt) where rn>=1 and rn<=3
select count(*) as cnt from mymemoryalbum
select count(*) as cnt from mymemoryalbum where memory_id = #{id}
select count(*) as cnt from mymemoryalbum where memory_category = 'health'
mapper.update: update mymemoryalbum set memory_hit = memory_hit + 1 where memory_num = #{memory_num}
update mymemoryalbum set memory_rec = memory_rec + 1 where memory_num = #{memory_num}
update mymemoryalbum set memory_nrec = memory_nrec + 1 where memory_num = #{memory_num}
mapper.select: select * from memoryComment where memory_seq = #{memory_seq} order by reg_date desc
